column2: List of collecting stations of Freshwater Fishes [Habitat, Locality and Geographical co-ordinates]

Tributaries of main rivers, rivers, irrigation canals, natural ponds, innundated lowland from Midnapore,
Bankura a.nd Hooghly Districts [22-23.3°N; 86-88.3°E]
Churni River at Chakdaha in the district of Nadia [23ºN and 88.5ºE]
Ten perennial pond of Ramnagar, East Midnapore district [21.8°N and 87.8°E]

Major rivers, like Atrai, Punarbhaba, Tangan, Jamuna, in minor rivers, like Ichhamoti, and in kharis
like, Kalkali, Kashiani and Brahmani. Beels visited were Danga and Gochina in south Dinajpur district

Karala river, a tributary of Teesta river at Jalpaiguri district [26º47'13''N, 88º32'17''E Aquiduct;
26º31'51''N, 88º43'23''E Hakimpara; 26º28'42''N, 88º44'27''E Daspara]

Karala river, a tributary of Teesta river at Jalpaiguri district [26°47'13" N, 88°32'17" E, Aquiduct;
26°31'51" N, 88°43'23" E Hakim Para; 26°28'42" N, 88°44'27"E, Daspara]
Ten perennial ponds and Mundaswari River in the Khanakul, Hooghly district

Damodar River, Burdwan district [23°12'44.82˝ N, 87°51'2.75˝ E Krisak setu; 23°10'10.51˝ N,
87°58'0.046˝ E Barsul; 23°9'37.45˝ N, 87°59'0.082˝ E Palla]

Teesta, Torsa, Kaljani, Radak - I, Raidak - II, Sankosh rivers in Darjeeling and Jalpaiguri districts
[88º6'- 89º54' E and 26º30'-27º13' N]

Kangsabati Reservoir in Bankura District [22º55’16.53’’N–23º2’30.41’’N and 86º37’55.30’’E–
86º47’23.35’’E]
Mahananda, Tangon and Punarbhaba are tributary of Terai rivers
East Kolkata Wetlands in mature delta of Ganges River [22°25’ to 22°40’ Nand 88°2 0’ to 88°35’ E]

Tributaries of Torsa river: Ghargharia, Kaljani, Khutamara, Char Torsa and Siltorsa [Torsa river
starting at Jaigaon (26°44'32''N and 89°19'27''E); Kaljani river at Mohona (26°16'52''N and

89°54′35″ to 88°47′44″ E]

River Kaljani in Cooch Behar District [Amlaguri (26°34’ N - 89°58’ E), Chhatoa (26°32’ N - 89°58’

Sundarban Biosphere Reserve, South 24 Parganas district [21°40'N - 22°40'N, and 88°03'E - 89°07'E]
Mukutmanipur, Panchet, Murguma, Kuki Dams and Kansai River in Purulia district

Hooghly River stretch in Hooghly Dist [Serampore (N 22º45.803/ E 88º20.879) to Tribeni
(N22º59.728/E 88º24.525)]
